body: Came for the sex but found myself heartbroken and bitter at the end. I asked for the passion NOT the feelingsssss. *banging my head to table*

I remember this story. It's absolutely INSANE, but it's still DAMN GOOD!!! I just wish that the ending was happier, but I think it's still good. Asumiko Nakamura's art just amazing. It's the type of art that creates a unique tone and bold atmosphere. It's just absolutely brilliant!!!😰😁
